featuredNews.title: Featured News
featuredNews.subtitle: Latest featured information and insights on personal finance

news1.title: Can I Really Retire at 55 in Vietnam?
news1.desc: Retiring at 55 in Vietnam is an achievable goal, but it depends on reaching a specific financial number, not just an age. It requires disciplined planning to accumulate a nest egg worth about 25 times your annual living expenses.

news2.title: 3 Common Money Mistakes
news2.desc: Avoid these common pitfalls to secure your financial future.

news3.title: Why Financial Literacy is Key for Your Employees?
news3.desc: An employee's financial stress directly impacts their focus and productivity at work. This article argues that providing financial education is a strategic investment for companies.

news4.title: A Beginner's Guide to Building Wealth
news4.desc: Building wealth is a journey that requires knowledge, discipline, and a solid plan. This guide covers the essential steps to start your wealth-building journey.

news5.title: Lifetime Money: Planning for Financial Security
news5.desc: Lifetime Money is about creating a sustainable financial plan that ensures security and peace of mind throughout your life. This article explores strategies for achieving this goal.

news6.title: 5 Tips to Retire Comfortably at 55
news6.desc: Retiring comfortably at 55 requires careful planning and smart financial decisions.

clauses.title: DISCLAIMER AND LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
clauses.intro: MoneyWise Vietnam provides general personal finance education, consulting, and training services for informational and educational purposes only. All content across this website, videos, and social media platforms ‚Äî including guidance, budgeting methods, or financial tips ‚Äî must not be considered personalized financial, investment, tax, or legal advice for your individual circumstances.
clauses.section1: Any descriptions of services, methods, or financial concepts are general in nature and cannot substitute professional consultation with qualified, licensed advisors. MoneyWise Vietnam does not provide specialized investment advisory, securities advice, or portfolio management services requiring registration with Vietnam's State Securities Commission (SSC).
clauses.section2: MoneyWise Vietnam assumes no legal responsibility for any financial decisions or outcomes based on the use of information provided in our materials. When you need specific investment or securities advice, you must consult licensed professionals authorized by the SSC.
clauses.section3: All content is provided without consideration of your personal financial situation, family circumstances, or specific objectives. It may therefore be unsuitable for some individuals. Personal finance decisions inherently involve risks, uncertainties, and potential financial losses. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
clauses.section4: Additional risks include market volatility, legal and regulatory changes, and macroeconomic fluctuations. Information presented by MoneyWise Vietnam may become inaccurate, outdated, or incomplete at any time. We make no warranty or representation regarding the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any information, and we disclaim all liability for damages ‚Äî direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or otherwise ‚Äî arising from reliance on such information.
clauses.section5: By accessing, viewing, or relying on MoneyWise Vietnam's content (including website, videos, or social media), you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to all terms of this disclaimer. All disputes shall be governed exclusively by Vietnamese law, and any proceedings shall take place in the competent courts of Vietnam.
clauses.conclusion: If you do not agree with any part of this disclaimer, please stop using or viewing our content immediately. This disclaimer may be updated, revised, or replaced at any time without prior notice. Continued use implies acceptance of the latest terms.

larry-truong.name: Larry Truong
larry-truong.bio:
Larry Truong ‚Äì Money Coach & Managing Director | Money Coach
Larry Truong is a seasoned professional in personal finance, with over 30 years of experience across both global and local markets‚Äîincluding two decades deeply engaged in Vietnam's evolving financial services landscape. He leads MoneyWise Vietnam with a focus on delivering practical, high-impact personal finance solutions tailored to the needs of Vietnamese individuals and enterprises. The professional development programs he and his team have implemented have empowered over 50,000 financial advisors, sales managers, and 1,000 employees through transformative learning systems‚Äîsetting new benchmarks for professionalism across the industry.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when you register on our website, express interest in obtaining information about us or our services, participate in activities on our website, or otherwise contact us. This includes your name, email address, phone number, and any other information you choose to provide.

section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
section2.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you about products and services that may interest you, respond to your inquiries and provide customer support, comply with legal obligations, and protect our rights and the rights of our users.

section3.title: 3. Information Sharing and Disclosure
section3.content: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business, as long as those parties agree to keep this information confidential. We may also disclose your information when required by law or to protect our rights.

section4.title: 4. Data Security
section4.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section5.title: 5. Your Rights
section5.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You may also object to or restrict certain processing of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at contact@moneywise.vn or 3 Nguy·ªÖn C∆° Th·∫°ch, Ph∆∞·ªùng An Kh√°nh, Qu·∫≠n 2, TP.HCM.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provisions of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our website or services.

section2.title: 2. Use of Services
section2.content: You agree to use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms of Use. You may not use our services in any way that could damage, disable, overburden, or impair our servers or networks, or interfere with any other party's use and enjoyment of our services.

section3.title: 3. Intellectual Property
section3.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of MoneyWise Vietnam or its content suppliers and is protected by Vietnamese and international copyright laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works from any content without our express written permission.

section4.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
section4.content: MoneyWise Vietnam shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use or inability to use our services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. Our total liability to you for all claims arising from your use of our services shall not exceed the amount you paid to us, if any.

section5.title: 5. Governing Law
section5.content: These Terms of Use shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Vietnam, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be resolved in the competent courts of Vietnam.

acceptance.title: Agreement
acceptance.content: By using our website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use.
